adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content and settings.
footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
heroSubtitle1: A space for deep healing, care, and transformation with ancestral medicines.
heroSubtitle2: Discover the path to your inner self and awaken your consciousness.
addVideoDescription: Add a new video to the past events carousel.
videoFormUrlOrUpload: Provide a video URL or upload a file.
deleteVideoConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the video.
upcomingCeremoniesSubtitle: Join our next healing experiences. Limited spots available.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to this ceremony. The changes will be visible to all users.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
deleteCeremonyConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this ceremony?
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
defaultContributionText: You can reserve with a 20% deposit.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section. Are you sure?
ceremonyMovedToPast: The ceremony has been moved to past events.
errorFinishingCeremony: There was an error finishing the ceremony.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is key to a transformative experience. We have created a complete guide to help you get ready physically, mentally, and spiritually.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral psychoactive brew from the Amazon, traditionally used for spiritual and healing purposes. It is made from the combination of the Banisteriopsis caapi vine and the leaves of the Psychotria viridis plant, which together activate its visionary properties.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The medicine works on a deep level, cleansing the body, mind, and spirit. It facilitates a process of introspection that allows for healing emotional wounds, releasing limiting patterns, and connecting with a higher state of consciousness.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a master plant that teaches, guides, and reveals profound truths about oneself and the universe. Each experience is unique and is adapted to the individual needs of each person.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: It helps to release emotional blockages, reduce anxiety and stress, providing a new perspective on life's problems.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It can facilitate the healing of traumas and deep wounds, promoting self-acceptance and unconditional love.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Many people experience a deep connection with nature, the universe, and their own spiritual essence.
groupCeremonyDescription: The energy of the group enhances the healing process. Sharing the journey with other people in a space of respect and support creates a powerful container for transformation.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and personalized process, we offer private ceremonies. This option allows for a deeper focus on your individual needs and intentions.
guidesPageSubtitle: We are a family dedicated to service, love, and the expansion of consciousness. Each of us is committed to supporting your healing process with respect and professionalism.
editGuideDescription: Modify the information of this guide. The changes will be saved and reflected on the page.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action is permanent. Are you sure you want to delete this guide?
preparationProcessDescription: Weeks before, you begin a diet and mental preparation to cleanse your body and focus your intention.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred and contained space where, guided by facilitators, you connect with the medicine.
experienceProcessDescription: A profound inner journey of visions, emotions, and revelations that purifies and transforms.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we support you in applying the lessons learned to your daily life.
dietTitle: Sacred Diet: Nourishing Body and Spirit
dietSubtitle: The diet is a fundamental part of the preparation, purifying your body to receive the medicine in the best way.
allowedFoodsList: Lean meats (chicken, fish) in moderation and boiled
prohibitedFoodsTitle: Foods to Avoid (at least 7 days before)
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your mind is the vessel for this journey. Preparing it is essential.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and cultivate a state of receptivity.
intentionsDescription: Clearly reflect on what you want to heal or understand. What is your purpose for this ceremony?
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes. This will help you clarify your process.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can bring up deep emotions. It is vital to come with an open heart, willing to feel, forgive, and let go. Trust the process and the wisdom of the medicine. You are in a safe and loving space to heal.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare your personal items to ensure a comfortable and focused experience.
essentialsList: A notebook and pen to write down reflections
Any personal amulet or sacred object
contactCommunityText: We are a family and a community. If you have questions or just want to connect, don't hesitate to write to us. Follow us on our networks to stay up to date with our events and share reflections.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.
googleSuccessDescription: You have successfully signed in with Google.
registerSubtext: Join our community to begin your healing journey.
registerSuccessDescription: Your account has been created. Please check your email to verify it.
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to save your progress, access exclusive content, and receive updates about our ceremonies.
tourWelcomeDescription: Before we begin a brief tour of our space, could you provide us with your phone number? This will allow us to stay in touch about upcoming events.
tourPhoneNumberDescription: We will only use it for relevant communications.
tourPhoneNumberError: Could not save the phone number.
tourStepPastCeremonies: Here you can see memories and testimonials from our past ceremonies.
tourStepUpcomingCeremonies: In this section, you will find our next available dates. You can click on them to see more details.
tourStepFinal: Great! The next step is to fill out a brief health questionnaire. This is a crucial step to ensure your safety and well-being during the ceremony.
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer these questions honestly. This information is confidential and will help us ensure that the experience is safe and beneficial for you.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (heart problems, high blood pressure, etc.)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication (including antidepressants, anxiolytics, etc.)?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list the medications you are taking:
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of psychiatric conditions (schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with Ayahuasca or other master plants?
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your answers have been saved successfully.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was an error saving your answers. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
dialogSuccessTitle: Thank You for Completing the Questionnaire!
dialogSuccessDescription: This is a very important step on your path. To continue, we invite you to review our preparation guide.
chatbotWelcome: Welcome. I am your spiritual guide. How can I help you on your path to healing today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
userManagementSubtitle: View and manage all registered users in the application.
whatsappInviteMessage: Hello! I'm contacting you from El Arte de Sanar. We noticed you're interested in our ceremonies. To continue with the process, we invite you to fill out our health questionnaire. You can do so at the following link:
sendEmailDescription: Send an email to all registered users.
emailBodyPlaceholder: Write the content of your email here...
chatHistorySubtitle: Review all conversations with the Spiritual Guide.
allConversationsDescription: Click on a conversation to see the details.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: Review of the user's submitted answers.
themeTabDescription: Change the main colors of the application (uses HSL format).
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please select a video file or enter a URL.
editHeroVideoDescription: Replace the main background video of the home page.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about Ayahuasca, its benefits, and how our ceremonies work.
exploreCeremoniesDescription: Discover our upcoming dates and find the perfect ceremony for you.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the family dedicated to guiding you on this transformative journey.
